name: Resume of John zuo
body:
## Welcome to John zuo resume Pages.
* valid Australian Work Visa: Temporary Work(Skilled) visa (subclass 457) 
* email: 1523511691@qq.com

## PROFILE
* 4 years commercial experience with over 8 native iPhone/iPad app projects.
* 11 years experience in software development and product management.


## EXPERIENCE
### Senior iOS Developer,Halobear,Shanghai,China(May 2012 – Oct 2014)
You can visit http://www.halobear.com/halos to see the project ,I just finished both iphone and ipad.
It is the best app about wedding in china now.

iPhone app is for bride to find the best wedding company in their area.
* App website:: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/huan-xiong-jie-hun-quan-wan/id923953914?l=zh&ls=1&mt=8

iPad app is for wedding company to show all of their goods in the amazing ways.
We had selled 400 copyrights at the price of ten thousands RMB for a year right of use(includes one ipad)

* **Key techniques:** iOS7/8,Object-c,ARC,Unity3D,C/C++,CocoaPods,Github
AFNetworking,PhoneGap,SDWebImage,IDMPhtotoBrowser.
* **Beta distribution:** Testflight
* **Team size:** 2 iOS developer,2 Php Server developers,1 UX/UI designer ,1 QA,1 PM

### iOS Developer, ,Shanghai,China(Jan 2010 – April 2012 )
**Fulltime Freelancer**

I went through a number of commercial projects,and finally became a full-fledged iOS developer.I also delivered iOS dev introductory courses as well as coaching to developers at client companies.

Some apps in Appstore:

_"Beautiful Food"_
* **App website:** https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/mei-shi-tian-xia/id424182875?mt=8 
* **Key techniques:** iOS 5/6, manual memory management,Core Data,AFNetWorking

_"Shiqianjushou"_
* **App website:** https://itunes.apple.com/au/app/shi-qian-ju-shou/id558491366?mt=8  
* **Key techniques:** iOS 4/5, manual memory management,Core Data


### Jave Game Developer and Project Management,Jichuang network,Shanghai,China(Feb 2006 – Nov 2009)

Joined this company being a kjava game developer at begin and finished many kjava games on Nokia,Moto,Samsung phone.
Later,I promoted to Project Management and also I designed some games.

* **Game website:** http://www.99sjyx.com/soft/html/403.html
* **Key techniques:** Java,C/C++,eclipse
* **Team size:** 20 peoples,include Developer,Designer,UI/UX,Tester

### C/C++ Game Developer,Game Star,Shanghai,China(Feb 2003 – Dec 2005)
I was hired by the founder of this start-up mainly because of my outstanding technical skills among fresh graduates.During the three years service, I worked hard and make many games on PC ,I also ported game over to xbox platform.
Now this company was acquired by Disney.

* **Game website:** http://www.wildtangent.com/Games/polar-golfer
* **Game website:** http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hydro_Thunder
* **Key techniques:** C/C++,VS
* **Team size:** 50+ peoples

## EDUCATION
Huaihai University,Lianyungang —— Electronic Engineering

## SKILLS
* iOS native app development in general
* Photoshop(images slicing from designer’s PSD files)
* C/C++,Java,HTML,CSS,PHP,Unity3D,Swift
* Github,CocosPods
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
